mapper.select: select dest_no, flat, flng, store_name, location_id, reg_dt, view_cnt, location_cate_id, place_URL from gms_destination order by view_cnt desc limit 10;
select dest_no, flat, flng, store_name, location_id, reg_dt, view_cnt from gms_destination where dest_no=#{no}
mapper.insert: insert into gms_destination( flat, flng, store_name, location_id, location_cate_id, place_URL) values(#{flat}, #{flng}, #{storeName}, #{locationId}, #{categoryId}, #{placeURL}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE view_cnt = view_cnt + 1;
mapper.update: update gms_destination set dest_no = #{no}, flat = #{flat}, flng = #{flng}, store_name = #{storeName}, location_id = #{locationId}, reg_dt = #{regdt}, viwe_cnt = #{cnt} where destno = #{no}
